config_markup.conversion_label: El visitante entra en la página
config_markup.error_conversionpage: Debe seleccionar una página de conversión antes de guardar la prueba A/B.
config_markup.error_selected_notpublished: No puede seleccionar una página sin publicar como su página de objetivo de conversión.
config_markup.error_selected_samepage: No puede seleccionar la página que está probando como página de objetivo de conversión.

content_comparator_kpi.description: The selected page is the one that a visitor must click through to in order to count as a conversion. Results: Views are the number of visitors that visited the test page. Conversions are the number of visitors that clicked through to the selected landing page while the test was running.
content_comparator_kpi.name: Landing Page

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: El visitante entra en la página

kpi_messaging.missing_client: Client Script Wrapper resource could not be found
kpi_messaging.uimarkup_not_defined: El atributo de clase UIMarkupAttribute no está definido.

config_markup.conversion_label: Number of minutes until another page is visited
config_markup.error_invalid_timeoutvalue: Number of minutes must be a value between 1 and 60

stickysite_kpi.description: Converts when a visitor views the test page and then visits any other page on the website within the same browser session. Results: Views are the number of visitors that visited the web page. Conversions are the number of visitors that clicked through to any other page on the website within the specified time.
stickysite_kpi.name: Site Stickiness

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: Visitor navigates to any other page within {0} minute(s).

config_markup.conversionlabel: Number of seconds visitor remains on the page.
config_markup.notpositiveinteger: Value must be a whole number ranging from 1 to 1800.

timeonpage_kpi.description: Monitors how long a visitor spends on a page and converts after a specified amount of time. Views: Number of visitors that viewed the page under test. Conversions: The number of visitors that remained on the page for the minimum time specified.
timeonpage_kpi.name: Time on Page

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: Number of seconds visitor remains on the page:
